overview:
A serial entrepreneur, Richard Jones is now building his 4th company.

The British borne systems management consultant moved to Australia in 1996 and contracted to Australia’s largest ISP, Telstra Bigpond. Consulting in operations management for the ISP presented an opportunity and once Australian residency was achieved in 1998, Richard spotted a gap in the market and left to start ASA Knowledge.

In 2005 ASA Knowedge was successfully sold to enterprise software giant, BMC Software.

6 years on and another successful startup under his belt, Richard is moving to San Francisco to do it again, this time in the deals space.
